name: Evelyn 'Eve' Marlowe
dialogue_tone: distinctive, husky voice that often carries a tinge of sarcasm. She expresses her views with a dry, witty tone making her thoughts both entertaining and insightful.

personality_traits.description: Her moods often shift erratically, changing frequently and without warning.
She always finds her own company more satisfying than being with others.
Her indulgence in junk food stamps her as a glutton.
Beneath her quirks, lies a razor-sharp intelligence, with an extraordinary eye for detail.

living_conditions: Prefers solitude and loves spending hours alone in her home office.
Completely immersed in films and art pieces, delivering detailed and thorough critiques.
